    • Method Detail

      • createActorSystem

        public static scala.Tuple2<akka.actor.ActorSystem,Object> createActorSystem(String name,
                                                            String host,
                                                            int port,
                                                            SparkConf conf,
                                                            SecurityManager securityManager)
        Creates an ActorSystem ready for remoting, with various Spark features. Returns both the ActorSystem itself and its port (which is hard to get from Akka).

        Note: the name parameter is important, as even if a client sends a message to right host + port, if the system name is incorrect, Akka will drop the message.

        If indestructible is set to true, the Actor System will continue running in the event of a fatal exception. This is used by Executor.

      • askTimeout

        public static scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration askTimeout(SparkConf conf)
        Returns the default Spark timeout to use for Akka ask operations.
